title: Software Developer
intro: I am a new graduate in the tech field, with a business and accounting background. Through the combination of my passion for technology and my interest in the world of business, I embarked on a journey to further my education in Computer Science. During my time at school, I delved into all aspects of software development from ideation, to building and testing.

My education in business provided me with a solid foundation in areas such as finance, accounting, marketing, and project management. This knowledge, combined with my technical skills, equips me with a unique perspective to bridge the gap between technology and business needs.

During my time as a student, I had opportunities to contribute in practical settings. I engaged in capstone projects that involved planning, proposing and creating apps for companies. These experiences have taught me how to work in a team, communicate effectively and solve unique problems.

Thank you for taking the time to learn a bit about me. I am enthusiastic about connecting with professionals and organizations that share my passion and I look forward to the exciting opportunities that await me!
